name: codeowners-status
description: Show owning teams from CODEOWNERS file in the status bar.

commands.title: Open CODEOWNERS File at Matching Rule

codeowners.showDebugLogs.description: Show debug logs in output channel

codeowners.statusBarPriority.description: Priority of the status bar item (higher numbers appear more to the left)

codeowners.additionalCodeownersPaths.description: Additional paths to search for CODEOWNERS files (relative to workspace root)

codeowners.allowMissingOwners.description: Allow CODEOWNERS lines with path patterns but no owners (indicates files can be approved by anyone)

scripts.compile-with-lint: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
